description: Try our easy to follow Pork & Caramelised Onion Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork & Caramelised Onion Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Cook sausages, turning occasionally, for 8 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.

Add butter and onions to pan. Cook, stirring, for 10 minutes or until onion has softened and lightly browned. Add sugar and balsamic. Cook, stirring for 10 minutes or until caramelised. Transfer to a bowl. Cover to keep warm.
lightly toast bread rolls, split rolls along one side.
Fill rolls with rocket leaves, sausage and onion mixture. Add BBQ sauce and serve.
